title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: So today I tried to open League and suddenly it said that PVP.net Patcher kernal popped up and it sayed it stopped working.  It says a problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a  solution is available. Is it just that the game is receiving updates or am I just an idiot who doesn't{{champion:17}}  know how to fix this??? Please help.

replies.body: usally u can get the game to go by right clicking and run as admin   i have to do this at least twice a week since forever

Patcher Kernel Errors almost always involve a type of OS Permissions Issue.  Essentially League of Legends is trying to run, but the OS is stopping it from doing so.  In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).

Give me a heads up if you still have any issues!
